      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AntGame
      This class represents an ant game being played.

      Fields in basis declared as Game 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Game GameThread.game
      The game which is runned by the game thread.
      private Game Bot.game
      The game in which the bot is currently in.
      Methods in basis that return Game 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Game GameThread.getGame()
      Gets the game runned by this game thread.

      Methods in basis with parameters of type Game 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameServer.addGame(Game game)
      Adds a game on the game server and creates a thread to run it.
      void GameHandler.addGame(Game newGame)
      Notifies the server that a game has been created and should be run.
      void Bot.setGame(Game game)
      Sets the game of a bot.
      Constructors in basis with parameters of type Game 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new game thread from a game instance.
